root.name: Revelations 2012
root.description: OverviewRevelations 2012 is a first-person shooter built using the Source Engine that supports four-player co-op. It is themed after the supposed apocalypse that is predicted in some circles to occur in 2012, when the Mayan calendar cycle ends and resets. The game plays in a manner similar to Valve's Left 4 Dead with the zombies swapped out for Mayan warriors.PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS:Windows® 7 32/64-bit / Vista 32/64 / XPProcessor:Pentium 4 3.0GHzMemory:1 GB for XP / 2GB for Vista GB RAMGraphics:DirectX 9 compatible video card with 128 MB, Shader model 2.0.
